```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = dataForReport[["showCode"]],results='asis')
options(width = 3000)
```


```{r,include=FALSE}
reportTemplates=dataForReport[["reportTemplates"]]
out = NULL

for (i in 1:length(reportTemplates)) {
  rmdFile=reportTemplates[i]
  if (file.exists(rmdFile)) {
    out = c(out, knit_child(rmdFile))
  } else {
    warning(paste0("File ",rmdFile," defined in reportTemplates but doesn't exist."))
  }
  
}


```

`r paste(knit(text = out), collapse = '\n')`
